snippet.title: Beat Da Beat Trailer
snippet.description:
The upcoming title for mobile phones. This summer you will:

Avoid the rain of bullets to the rhythms of "dubstep". Help the hero to defeat the aliens and to take revenge on the interstellar aggressor!

Beat the Beat combines the two genres "Bullet Hell" and "Rhythm Game" to create a really unique and thrilling challenge. Join the beat soon!

The game is going to be released for mobile devices (iOS, Android, Windows Phone) in summer 2015!
